item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: September 24, 2022 Today's Verse Romans 8:31 [31] What then shall we say to these things? If God is for us, who can be against us? Today's Memory Verse Isaiah 40:30-31 - Even youths shall faint and be weary, and young men shall fall exhausted; but they who wait for the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings like eagles; they shall run and not be weary; they shall walk and not faint.
